jcobol.reader
Interface CobolLine

All Known Implementing Classes:
CobolLineFixed, CobolLineFree
public interface CobolLine

A interfaz for fixed & free format cobol lines.

Method Summary
 int getFirstColumn()
          Return the column where getSource() content starts.
 char getIndicator()
          Extract the indicator from the source code line.
 int getLineNumber()
          The line number of this line.
 java.lang.String getSource()
          Get the source code content, minus sequence number/indicator/id area.
 boolean isFixed()
          Evaluate fixed/free format.
 

Method Detail

getIndicator

char getIndicator()
Extract the indicator from the source code line.

For fixed cobol format, indicator is extracted from column 7; for free format, is extracted from column 1 (if any).

Returns:
The indicator (space by default);

getFirstColumn

int getFirstColumn()
Return the column where getSource() content starts.

Returns:
The first column

getSource

java.lang.String getSource()
Get the source code content, minus sequence number/indicator/id area.

Returns:
The source code

getLineNumber

int getLineNumber()
The line number of this line.

Returns:
1..n

isFixed

boolean isFixed()
Evaluate fixed/free format.

Returns:
true if this is a fixed format line.
